titleStmt.title: The adepts case, briefly shewing: I. What adepts are, and what they are said to perform. II. What reason there is, to think that there are adepts. III. What would invite them to appear, and be beneficial in a nation. IV. What arguments there are, for and against the taking of such measures.

notesStmt.note: With an advertisement at foot of verso
Item at reel E7:1[15] imperfect: creased, affecting print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
